mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, GENDER, PHONE, ADDRESS) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, EMAIL = #{email}, AGE = #{age}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address}, GENDER = #{gender}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
